name: tech-docs-monitor
description: Sends Slack notifications for Tech Docs pages that need reviewing

SITE_PAGE_API_URL.description: The full URL to your site's `/api/pages.json` file.

SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL.description: The Slack webhook URL to allow messages to be posted.

REALLY_POST_TO_SLACK.description: Messages will only be posted to Slack if the value of this var is `1`.
